column25: A jewel thief returns to his hiding place after a stint in jail — only to find that his diamond is buried under a newly constructed police station.

column27: ^As Cindy and Dean muddle through their languishing marriage
column28: they hearken back to the golden days when life was filled with possibility and romance.^

column25: ^In a future where the elite inhabit an island paradise far from the crowded slums
column26: you get one chance to join the 3% saved from squalor.^
